verbs.description: The [V: retiring] [ARG0: head] of Yellowstone National Parks accused the Trump administration of forcing him out early over squabbling with the Interior Department .
[ARG0: The retiring head of Yellowstone National Parks] [V: accused] [ARG1: the Trump administration] [ARG2: of forcing him out early over squabbling with the Interior Department] .
